renamemod.gui.title: Rename Item
renamemod.gui.error_invalid: Invalid name! Use only lowercase, numbers and underscores.
renamemod.gui.error_no_item: No item selected! Hold an item in hand.
renamemod.gui.hint: Name must match a texture in your Resource Pack
renamemod.chat.no_resource: Warning: No texture found for '%s'. Original texture will show.
